h2401.definition: feminine of {{h2399}}; an offence, or a sacrifice for it; sin (offering).

h2402.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2401}}; an offence, and the penalty or sacrifice for it; sin (offering).

h2403.definition: or חַטָּאת; from {{h2398}}; an offence (sometimes habitual sinfulness), and its penalty, occasion, sacrifice, or expiation; also (concretely) an offender; punishment (of sin), purifying(-fication for sin), sin(-ner, offering).

h2404.definition: a primitive root; to chop or carve wood; cut down, hew(-er), polish.

h2405.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h2404}}; properly, a carving; hence, a tapestry (as figured); carved.

h2406.definition: of uncertain derivation; wheat, whether the grain or the plant; wheat(-en).

h2407.definition: from an unused root of uncertain signification; Chattush, the name of four or five Israelites; Hattush.

h2408.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2398}}; an offence; sin.

h2409.definition: (Aramaic) from the same as {{h2408}}; an expiation; sin offering.

h2410.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to dig out; explorer; Chatita, a temple porter; Hatita.

h2411.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to wave; fluctuating; Chattil, one of 'Solomon's servants'; Hattil.

h2412.definition: from {{h2414}}; robber; Chatipha, one of the Nethinim; Hatipha.

h2413.definition: a primitive root; to stop; refrain.

h2414.definition: a primitive root; to clutch; hence, to seize as a prisoner; catch.

h2415.definition: from an unused root of uncertain signification; a twig; rod.

h2416.definition: from {{h2421}}; alive; hence, raw (flesh); fresh (plant, water, year), strong; also (as noun, especially in the feminine singular and masculine plural) life (or living thing), whether literally or figuratively; age, alive, appetite, (wild) beast, company, congregation, life(-time), live(-ly), living (creature, thing), maintenance,   merry, multitude,   (be) old, quick, raw, running, springing, troop.

h2417.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h2418}}; alive; also (as noun in plural) life; life, that liveth, living.

h2418.definition: (Aramaic) or חֲיָה; (Aramaic), corresponding to {{h2421}}; to live; live, keep alive.

h2419.definition: from {{h2416}} and {{h410}}; living of God; Chiel, an Israelite; Hiel.

h2420.definition: from {{h2330}}; a puzzle, hence, a trick, conundrum, sententious maxim; dark saying (sentence, speech), hard question, proverb, riddle.

h2421.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2331}}, {{h2421}}); to live, whether literally or figuratively; causatively, to revive; keep (leave, make) alive, × certainly, give (promise) life, (let, suffer to) live, nourish up, preserve (alive), quicken, recover, repair, restore (to life), revive, (× God) save (alive, life, lives), × surely, be whole.

h2425.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2421}}); to live; causatively to revive; live, save life.

h2426.definition: or (shortened) חֵל; a collateral form of {{h2428}}; an army; also (by analogy,) an intrenchment; army, bulwark, host,   poor, rampart, trench, wall.

h2427.definition: and (feminine) חִילָה; from {{h2342}}; a throe (expectant of childbirth); pain, pang, sorrow.

h2428.definition: from {{h2342}}; probably a force, whether of men, means or other resources; an army, wealth, virtue, valor, strength; able, activity, ( ) army, band of men (soldiers), company, (great) forces, goods, host, might, power, riches, strength, strong, substance, train, ( ) valiant(-ly), valour, virtuous(-ly), war, worthy(-ily).

h2429.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2428}}; an army, or strength; aloud, army, × most (mighty), power.

h2431.definition: or חֵלָאםxlit Chêlʼâm corrected to Chêlâʼm; from {{h2428}}; fortress; Chelam, a place East of Palestine; Helam.

h2432.definition: from {{h2428}}; fortress; Chilen, a place in Palestine; Hilen.

h2434.definition: another form for {{h2351}}; a wall; wall.

h2435.definition: from {{h2434}}; properly, the (outer) wall side; hence, exterior; figuratively, secular (as opposed to sacred); outer, outward, utter, without.

h2436.definition: or חֵק; and חוֹק; from an unused root, apparently meaning to inclose; the bosom (literally or figuratively); bosom, bottom, lap, midst, within.

h2437.definition: from {{h2357}} in the sense of splendor; Chirah, an Adullamite; Hirah.

h2438.definition: or חִירוֹםlemma חִירֹם missing vav, corrected to חִירוֹם; another form of {{h2361}}; Chiram or Chirom, the name of two Tyrians; Hiram, Huram.

h2439.definition: another form of {{h2363}}; to hurry; make haste.

h2440.definition: from {{h2439}}; properly, a hurry; hence (adverb) quickly; soon.

h2441.definition: probably from {{h2596}} in the sense of tasting; properly, the palate or inside of the mouth; hence, the mouth itself (as the organ of speech, taste and kissing); (roof of the) mouth, taste.

h2442.definition: a primitive root (apparently akin to {{h2707}} through the idea of piercing); properly, to adhere to; hence, to await; long, tarry, wait.

h2443.definition: probably from {{h2442}}; a hook (as adhering); angle, hook.

h2444.definition: from the same as {{h2447}}; dark; Chakilah, a hill in Palestine; Hachilah.

h2445.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2449}}; wise, i.e. a Magian; wise.

h2446.definition: from the base of {{h2447}} and {{h3050}}; darkness of Jah; Chakaljah, an Israelite; Hachaliah.

h2447.definition: by reduplication from an unused root apparently meaning to be dark; darkly flashing (only of the eyes); in a good sense, brilliant (as stimulated by wine); red.

h2448.definition: from {{h2447}}; flash (of the eyes); in a bad sense, blearedness; redness.

h2449.definition: a primitive root,; to be wise (in mind, word or act); × exceeding, teach wisdom, be (make self, shew self) wise, deal (never so) wisely, make wiser.

h2450.definition: from {{h2449}}; wise, (i.e. intelligent, skilful or artful); cunning (man), subtil, (un-), wise((hearted), man).

h2451.definition: from {{h2449}}; wisdom (in a good sense); skilful, wisdom, wisely, wit.

h2453.definition: from {{h2449}}; skilful; Chakmoni, an Israelite; Hachmoni, Hachmonite.

h2454.definition: or חַכְמוֹת; collateral forms of {{h2451}}; wisdom; wisdom, every wise (woman).

h2455.definition: from {{h2490}}; properly, exposed; hence, profane; common, profane (place), unholy.

h2456.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2470}}); to be sick; be diseased.

h2457.definition: from {{h2456}}; properly, disease; hence, rust; scum.

h2458.definition: the same as {{h2457}}; Chelah, an Israelitess; Helah.

h2459.definition: or חֵלֶב; from an unused root meaning to be fat; fat, whether literally or figuratively; hence, the richest or choice part; × best, fat(-ness), × finest, grease, marrow.

h2460.definition: the same as {{h2459}}; fatness; Cheleb, an Israelite; Heleb.

h2461.definition: from the same as {{h2459}}; milk (as the richness of kine); cheese, milk, sucking.

h2462.definition: feminine of {{h2459}}; fertility; Chelbah, a place in Palestine; Helbah.

h2463.definition: from {{h2459}}; fruitful; Chelbon, a place in Syria; Helbah.

h2464.definition: from {{h2459}}; galbanam, an odorous gum (as if fatty); galbanum.

h2465.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to glide swiftly; life (as a fleeting portion of time); hence, the world (as transient); age, short time, world.

h2466.definition: the same as {{h2465}}; Cheled, an Israelite; Heled.

h2467.definition: from the same as {{h2465}}; a weasel (from its gliding motion); weasel.

h2468.definition: feminine of {{h2467}}; Chuldah, an Israelitess; Huldah.

h2469.definition: from {{h2466}}; worldliness; Cheldai, the name of two Israelites; Heldai.

h2470.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2342}}, {{h2470}}, {{h2490}}); properly, to be rubbed or worn; hence (figuratively) to be weak, sick, afflicted; or (causatively) to grieve, make sick; also to stroke (in flattering), entreat; beseech, (be) diseased, (put to) grief, be grieved, (be) grievous, infirmity, intreat, lay to, put to pain, × pray, make prayer, be (fall, make) sick, sore, be sorry, make suit (× supplication), woman in travail, be (become) weak, be wounded.

h2471.definition: from {{h2490}}; a cake (as usually punctured); cake.

h2472.definition: or (shortened) חֲלֹם; from {{h2492}}; a dream; dream(-er).

h2473.definition: or (shortened) חֹלֹן; probably from {{h2344}}; sandy; Cholon, the name of two places in Palestine; Holon.

h2475.definition: from {{h2498}}; properly, surviving; by implication (collectively) orphans; × destruction.

h2476.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h2522}}; defeat; being overcome.

h2477.definition: probably of foreign origin; Chalach, a region of Assyria; Halah.

h2478.definition: by reduplication from {{h2342}}; contorted; Chalchul, a place in Palestine; Halhul.

h2479.definition: feminine from the same as {{h2478}}; writhing (in childbirth); by implication, terror; (great, much) pain.

h2480.definition: a primitive root; to snatch at; catch.

h2481.definition: from {{h2470}}; a trinket (as polished); jewel, ornament.

h2482.definition: the same as {{h2481}}; Chali, a place in Palestine; Hali.

h2483.definition: from {{h2470}}; malady, anxiety, calamity; disease, grief, (is) sick(-ness).

h2486.definition: or חָלִלָה; a directive from {{h2490}}; literal for a profaned thing; used (interj.) far be it!; be far, (× God) forbid.

h2489.definition: or חֵלְכָה; apparently from an unused root probably meaning to be dark or (figuratively) unhappy; a wretch, i.e. unfortunate; poor.

h2490.definition: a primitive root (compare {{h2470}}); also	denominative (from {{h2485}}); properly, to bore, i.e. (by implication) to wound, to dissolve; figuratively, to profane (a person, place or thing), to break (one's word), to begin (as if by an 'opening wedge'); to play (the flute); begin (× men began), defile, × break, defile, × eat (as common things), × first, × gather the grape thereof, × take inheritance, pipe, player on instruments, pollute, (cast as) profane (self), prostitute, slay (slain), sorrow, stain, wound.

h2491.definition: from {{h2490}}; pierced (especially to death); figuratively, polluted; kill, profane, slain (man), × slew, (deadly) wounded.

h2492.definition: a primitive root; properly, to bind firmly, i.e. (by implication) to be (causatively to make) plump; also (through the figurative sense of dumbness) to dream; (cause to) dream(-er), be in good liking, recover.

h2493.definition: (Aramaic) from a root corresponding to {{h2492}}; a dream; dream.

h2494.definition: from {{h2492}}; a dream; Chelem, an Israelite; Helem. Compare {{h2469}}.

h2495.definition: from {{h2492}} (in the sense of insipidity); probably purslain; egg.

h2496.definition: probably from {{h2492}} (in the sense of hardness); flint; flint(-y), rock.

h2497.definition: from {{h2428}}; strong; Chelon, an Israelite; Helon.

h2498.definition: a primitive root; properly, to slide by, i.e. (by implication) to hasten away, pass on, spring up, pierce or change; abolish, alter, change, cut off, go on forward, grow up, be over, pass (away, on, through), renew, sprout, strike through.

h2499.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h2498}}; to pass on (of time); pass.

h2500.definition: from {{h2498}}; properly, exchange; hence (as preposition) instead of; × for.
